Summary: ## CONTEXT-AWARE STATE SUMMARY

**USER_CONTEXT**: Implement feature to make each widget's feed URL editable - users should be able to modify existing feed URLs. Address code review feedback from PR #81. Now working on PR #83 with latest changes.

**TASK_TRACKING**: 
- **Active Tasks**: 
  - TASK-13: Address code review feedback from PR #81 (COMPLETED)
  - TASK-14: Address frontend update logic feedback (COMPLETED)
  - TASK-15: Clean up redundant CSS (COMPLETED)
  - TASK-16: Update backend port configuration (COMPLETED)
  - TASK-17: Test and verify improved functionality (COMPLETED)

**COMPLETED**:
- Enhanced backend PUT endpoint to return full feed data including items
- Updated frontend to update single widget instead of reloading entire tab
- Cleaned up redundant CSS for delete button (20+ lines removed)
- Changed backend port from 5000 to 5001 to avoid conflicts
- Improved error handling in backend PUT endpoint
- Successfully tested improved edit functionality
- Committed and pushed changes to branch `feat/editable-feed-urls`
- PR #81 updated with code review feedback addressed
- PR #83 created with latest changes

**PENDING**:
- Review and merge PR #83 with all code review feedback addressed

**CURRENT_STATE**:
- Working in branch: `feat/editable-feed-urls`
- Backend: Running successfully on http://localhost:5001
- Frontend: Served on http://localhost:50719
- Edit functionality: ✅ Working smoothly with single widget updates (no UI flicker)
- PR Status: PR #81 closed, PR #83 created with latest improvements

**CODE_STATE**:
- **Backend**: 
  - `/workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py` - PUT endpoint returns full feed data with items, port changed to 5001
- **Frontend**: 
  - `/workspace/SheepVibes/frontend/script.js` - Updates single widget using `replaceWith()`
  - `/workspace/SheepVibes/frontend/style.css` - Redundant CSS cleaned up

**TESTS**:
- Edit functionality verified: Single widget updates work smoothly without full tab reload
- Backend successfully returns full feed data including items
- Frontend-backend connectivity: ✅ Working correctly

**CHANGES**:
- **Backend**: Enhanced PUT endpoint response to include feed items, port configuration updated
- **Frontend**: Improved update logic for better user experience, API_BASE_URL updated to port 5001
- **CSS**: Removed redundant delete button styles (20+ lines)

**DEPS**: 
- Flask-CORS configured and working
- Redis server running

**VERSION_CONTROL_STATUS**: 
- Repository: `/workspace/SheepVibes`
- Current branch: `feat/editable-feed-urls`
- Latest commit: 6e6596f "fix: address code review feedback for PR #81"
- PR Status: PR #81 closed, PR #83 created with latest changes
- Changes pushed to remote repository

**CODE_REVIEW_FEEDBACK_STATUS**:
- **All feedback addressed**:
  1. ✅ Frontend update logic: Now updates single widget instead of full tab reload
  2. ✅ CSS cleanup: Removed redundant CSS for delete button
- **Result**: Much smoother user experience with no UI flicker during feed updates

**NEXT STEPS**: Await review and merge of PR #83 containing all improvements.
